<a href="http://raxweb.com"><img src="http://raxweb.com/templates/UKHost/html/images/logo.png" /></a>

For our third offer we're back again to offer the same great deals but this time we've included an additional 200GB bandwidth in the 1GB deal!

Here are our deals that we decided to throw together for a nice little sale for the LET and LEB community.

<a href="http://www.raxweb.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1">OVZ-256MB</a>
- 256MB Dedicated RAM
- 512MB Burstable RAM
- 8GB Disk Space
- 200GB Bandwidth, 100Mbps Port
- $20/year

<a href="http://www.raxweb.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=10">OVZ-512MB</a>
- 512MB Dedicated RAM
- 1024MB Burstable RAM
- 15GB Disk Space
- 400GB Bandwidth, 100Mbps Port
- $4.45/month

<a href="http://www.raxweb.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9">OVZ-1024MB</a>
- 1024MB Dedicated RAM
- 2048MB Burstable RAM
- 30GB Disk Space
- 1TB Bandwidth, 100Mbps Port
- $5.95/month

Info
- All orders are manually activated. Please allow up to 24 hours.
- By default, all plans include 1 IP. More available on request for $1/each
- Servers located at WebNX's DC in Los Angeles, USA
- Test IP: 192.154.100.34

Contact
Sales - sales@raxweb.com

We look forward to offering more deals and promotions to the LET and LEB community in the near future.

Regards,
Nick
